title: HTML Tables
description: Create structured data tables using <table>, <tr>, <td>, and <th> tags.

examples.output: A table with 2 columns: 'Name' and 'Age', and one row with Alice, 24.

constraints: Include at least one header row (<th>).
Have at least two rows of data.
Table must include a border for visibility.
starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Table Demo</title>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- Create your table here -->
</body>
</html>
hints: <th> is for header cells, <td> for normal cells.
Add border='1' to make the table visible.
